active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the ethical implications of 'Risk Acceptance' when balancing cybersecurity costs against potential facility damage from hybrid cyber-physical attacks (e.g., ransomware causing physical access failures). Use examples from real-world incidents like the Colonial Pipeline hack to support arguments on whether full mitigation is always feasible.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding
